header.tagline: Senior Sales Development Leader – SaaS & Retail Tech

summary: Dynamic sales development leader with over 10 years of expertise in SaaS & FinTech, consistently achieving 120% quota.

bullets.text: Conducted comprehensive quantitative and qualitative analysis to evaluate new business potential, increasing qualified lead volume by 42% within the LATAM region through strategic market assessment, resulting in a 15% increase in conversion rates.
Identified and cultivated new customer relationships in LATAM, directly contributing to $3.5M USD in new pipeline generation by aligning with Toshiba's expansive market strategy.
Evaluated and prioritized over 40 partner requests monthly, implementing a strategic scoring system to enhance partner quality by 38%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to achieve a 15% increase in channel revenue and spearheaded product enhancement initiatives within the first three quarters.
Represented Toshiba as an SME at 5 major industry events across LATAM, enhancing brand presence and driving strategic partnerships.
Sourced a record $200K USD deal for a major cosmetic brand within six months, surpassing individual sales targets by 25%.
Led a team of 3 BDRs, optimizing prospecting processes to accelerate pipeline growth by 30% through targeted coaching and development programs.
Led and coached a team of 8 SDRs across LATAM and U.S. markets, resulting in a 132% collective quota attainment over five consecutive quarters.
Designed efficient outbound sales strategies that enhanced SDR productivity, leading to a reduction in sales cycle time by 25%.
Developed comprehensive sales playbooks and performance tracking systems, improving SDR training completion rate by 45% within the first year.
Increased market penetration by developing targeted training programs that boosted regional growth by 20% YoY.
Initiated and successfully managed over 25 sales opportunities through outbound prospecting and lead qualification, securing a $1.2M USD deal with a major U.S. rental car company within six months.
Collaborated with marketing to refine lead qualification processes, achieving a 37% increase in lead-to-opportunity conversion rate.
Developed advanced sales outreach sequences that improved prospect engagement by 28%, leading to a pipeline growth surge.
Provided strategic insights on pipeline management, driving a 15% increase in closure rates through tactical adjustments.
Drove generation and qualification of high-value corporate leads, resulting in a consistent 98% average quota attainment across the SDR team.
Executed strategic cold-calling campaigns, securing an $880K deal with a premier U.S. stadium through targeted outreach.
Worked cross-functionally to develop effective call scripts and lead qualification criteria, boosting lead generation by 35%.
Prepared comprehensive reports, bids, and presentations, directly supporting commercial actions and enhancing client interactions.
Actively participated in marketing initiatives, achieving 120% of quota and earning recognition through a President’s Club award.
Managed a diverse portfolio of strategic accounts, achieving consistent quota attainment and earning multiple accolades for sales excellence.
Led initiatives that improved account growth and retention, using data-driven strategies to maximize revenue potential.

additionalExperience: Volunteered as a sales trainer at local community workshops, empowering aspiring entrepreneurs with essential sales skills.
